Annabelle : Creation was directed by David F Sandberg and stars Stephanie Sigman Talitha Bateman Anthony LaPaglia and Miranda Otto. This is a prequel to 2014 s Annabelle which was kinda disappointing to me and the fourth film in The Conjuring film franchise I enjoyed The Conjuring 1 2 though. One day several girls from an orphanage that s been closed and a nun moves into a house owned by Dollmaker Samuel Mullins and his wife who lost their daughter in a car accident a long time ago The doll called Annabelle which their daughter seems to have turned her soul into the doll so that she can always be with her parents sets her sights on those girls and tires to get their souls It turns their shelter into a storm of terror. It s just come out recently in Australia where I live now Finding that I rushed into the the atre and saw it though I didn t really expect it to be that great because of the previous one that was not good for me and I felt that wasted my time however the prequel didn t bore or tire me it was just great sometimes entertaining though still such an interesting story which is kinda simple though I wanna mention to those who are not planning to see this because of the previous one that you guys gotta go to the movies to see this It s worth watch ing it unless you hate horror films though I recommend this one to all of horror fans.
